item.description: If you are an aspiring pentester you should definitely use Kali Linux and make it your primary OS. Switching to a new OS can be a very hard decision to make. Concerns such as whether you can do your regular work may rise.

item.title: 5 Reasons Why Linux Needs No Antivirus
item.description: So, maybe you have heard Linux PCs are super safe because they are not affected by viruses. Linux computers are almost immune to viruses. Yes, I said “almost” immune. But the percentage of PCs being affected is very less, even less than 1%.
